channel.title: The 2014 World Cup will be hosted by
channel.description:
Brazil :)
Brazil is the only remaining official candidate to host the 2014 FIFA World Cup after Colombia withdrew its bid on April 11, 2007. The Brazilian bid was officially launched on December 13, 2006 by Ricardo Teixeira, the president of the Brazilian Football Confederation, who signed the letter of candidacy in Tokyo in the presence of CONMEBOL president Nicolas Leoz and CONMEBOL general secretary Eduardo De Luca.
Well I'm going to go see it :rolleyes: Visit my family over there while I'm at it Logo.. [IMG]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/e/e1/0%2C%2C9350253%2C00.jpg/200px-0%2C%2C9350253%2C00.jpg[/img]

I lol at international football.

Anyone from UK, Italy, and Spain (maybe France) will know that club football is much better.
[/quote]

Spain of course they know. They rent all of Brazil’s players to play in Real Madrid. And players from other places too…[/quote]

the only decent player which I think is good on Real madrid, was Raul.

item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:7, topic:111306”]They have 7 years to make a new one ;)…

I’ve heard of most of them since I lived in Brazil for 5 years :.[/quote]

Finally, a fellow brasileiro.
I’m white, but my ancestry lists back to the early 1800s in Brazil. I still have my citizenship to brasil as well.

and then my mom ruins it. she gave me all my new york blood

item.title: The 2014 World Cup will be hosted by
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:11, topic:111306”]I lol at international football.

Anyone from UK, Italy, and Spain (maybe France) will know that club football is much better.[/quote]

No, World Cup is usually more exciting. However club football is still pretty good.

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:9, topic:111306”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=158972.msg1493272#msg1493272 date=1181942141]

Yup…

Why all the dots?

And lol that logo looks shit, the Korea one looked pretty sexy.

Like anyone cares…

I’ve never even heard of most of those cities lel.

They have 7 years to make a new one ;)…

I’ve heard of most of them since I lived in Brazil for 5 years :.

Oman please tell me you won’t be supporting Brazil.
[/quote]

Lol. I kinda will :O… I can’t support the US because they will lose in the first round…

Last world cup they did have some good teams against them though[/quote]

I’m supporting England and a little bit Australia because my family all live there, and I would like to see them do well. The way they went out last World Cup was bullshit lool.

Read full topic

item.title: The 2014 World Cup will be hosted by
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Yup…

List of cities where it will be held…

* Belém, Pará - Estádio Olímpico Edgard Proença * Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais - Estádio Magalhães Pinto * Brasília, Federal District - Estádio Mané Garrincha * Campinas, São Paulo - indefinite name for new stadium * Campo Grande, Mato Grosso do Sul - Estádio Universitário P. Pedrossian * Cuiabá, Mato Grosso - Estádio Governador José Fragelli * Curitiba, Paraná - Kyocera Arena * Florianópolis, Santa Catarina - Arena Orlando Scarpelli * Fortaleza, Ceará - Estádio Plácido Castelo * Goiânia, Goiás - Estádio Serra Dourada * João Pessoa, Paraíba - Estádio José Américo de Almeida Filho * Maceió, Alagoas - Estádio Rei Pelé * Manaus, Amazonas - Estádio Vivaldo Lima * Natal, Rio Grande do Norte - indefinite name for new stadium * Porto Alegre, Rio Grande do Sul - Estádio José Pinheiro Borda * Recife/Olinda, Pernambuco - Recife-Olinda Arena * Rio Branco, Acre - Arena da Floresta * Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro - Estádio Jornalista Mário Filho * São Paulo, São Paulo - Estádio Cícero Pompeu de Toledo * Salvador, Bahia - Estádio Octávio Mangabeira * Teresina, Piauí - Estádio Governador Alberto Tavares Silva

Like anyone cares…

Read full topic
